identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and modal titles. Do NOT use Inter.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, table data, and labels.

mono.usage: Use for IDs, API keys, code snippets, and technical metadata.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@500;600;700;800&display=swap');

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use #09090B or #0A0A0A.
Primary color (#6366F1) is for CTAs and active states only. Do not overuse.
Borders should be subtle: border-white/10 or border-zinc-800.
Text on muted backgrounds must be #A1A1AA (Zinc 400) or lighter.

spacing_system.base: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Use col-span-2 for main charts.
grid_system.marketing: Tetris Grid Mode A: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8. Asymmetrical spans.
grid_system.kanban: Horizontal scroll container with fixed-width columns (w-80 or w-96). Gap-6.

container_styles.card: bg-card border border-border rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
container_styles.glass_header: bg-background/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/10 sticky top-0 z-50
container_styles.sidebar: bg-card border-r border-border h-screen sticky top-0

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10 px-4 transition-all

cards.style: rounded-xl border border-white/5 bg-zinc-900/50 backdrop-blur-sm hover:bg-zinc-900/80 transition-all duration-300

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients for backgrounds: bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-indigo-900/20 via-background to-background

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login/register pages with overlay

team_placeholder.usage: Dashboard welcome widget or 'About Organization' section

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use Inter for headings.
Do NOT use generic full-screen gradients.
Do NOT use 'transparent' backgrounds for dropdowns or headers without blur.
Always add data-testid to interactive elements.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Animations must be smooth (transition-all duration-300 ease-out) but respect prefers-reduced-motion.
instructions_to_main: You are building a professional SaaS Project Management tool. Follow the 'Performance Pro' archetype. Prioritize density and clarity in the dashboard, but use 'Tetris' grids for the landing page. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Ensure the dark mode is deep and rich, not washed out gray.
